description: This header file defines utility functions for synchronizing file contents to persistent storage and persisting JSON settings within a specific namespace.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes the contents of a file to disk by opening, flushing, calling fsync, and closing the file.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON value associated with a key into a file, updating the file and ensuring data is flushed to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
